content: @Jan Range I just re-discovered an API I need for a test and mentioned it here in case you weren't aware of it: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/9477#issuecomment-1498049884

Just saw your comment. This would be a great starting point, been experimenting with this one already. Maybe once the JSON Schema is implemented we can shift towards the more rigorous validation process.
Ah, so you already knew about it. Great!
